com.team08storyapp

Class PicAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.team08storyapp.PicAdapter

  • public class PicAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    PicAdapter is a customized Adapter based on BaseAdapter
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Sue Smith, Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PicAdapter(Context context, java.util.ArrayList<Photo> photoList, int currentStoryId, int currentStoryFragmentId)
      This constructor of PicAdapter will populate all images from photoList into a gallery with customized getView function.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPic(int currentPic, Bitmap newPic)
      addPic method is a helper method to add a bitmap to the gallery when the user chooses one
      int getCount()
      This function gives the number of bitmap images to be displayed in the adapter

      This function returns the photo in the adapter at the given index
      long getItemId(int position)
      This function retrieves the id of the photo at the given adapter index
      Bitmap getPic(int position)
      getPic returns bitmap at specified position for larger display
      View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
      get view specifies layout and display options for each thumbnail in the gallery

    • Constructor Detail

      • PicAdapter

        public PicAdapter(Context context,
          java.util.ArrayList<Photo> photoList,
          int currentStoryId,
          int currentStoryFragmentId)
        This constructor of PicAdapter will populate all images from photoList into a gallery with customized getView function.
        Parameters:
        context - a context object
        photoList - a list of photo objects
        currentStoryId - the id of current story object
        currentStoryFragmentId - the id of the current story fragment object

    • Method Detail

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        This function gives the number of bitmap images to be displayed in the adapter
        Returns:
        The length of the current Bitmaps array

      • getItem

        public java.lang.Object getItem(int position)
        This function returns the photo in the adapter at the given index
        Parameters:
        position - the index of the selected photo in the adapter
        Returns:
        The photo at the given adapter index

      • getItemId

        public long getItemId(int position)
        This function retrieves the id of the photo at the given adapter index
        Parameters:
        position - the index of the selected photo in the adapter
        Returns:
        The id of the photo at the given adapter index

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        get view specifies layout and display options for each thumbnail in the gallery
        Parameters:
        position - the index of the selected photo in the adapter
        convertView - the view that is going to be converted to user's desire
        parent - a ViewGroup object
        Returns:
        the converted view for the Photo

      • addPic

        public void addPic(int currentPic,
          Bitmap newPic)
        addPic method is a helper method to add a bitmap to the gallery when the user chooses one
        Parameters:
        currentPic - the index in the imageBitmaps
        newPic - new bitmap object that will be added to the currentPic position in the imageBitmaps

      • getPic

        public Bitmap getPic(int position)
        getPic returns bitmap at specified position for larger display
        Parameters:
        position - the index of the desired picture in the imageBitmaps
        Returns:
        the bitmap at the given position
